data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick Busan.
In the minute 3, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Busan.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 9, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 10, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Dong Jun Lee signals a Busan throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Sangju Civic Stadium, Ahn Tae-hyeon has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Busan.
Busan have a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 20, Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Busan push upfield but Dong Jun Lee quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 22, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Busan at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Busan.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Kwon Hyeok-kyu (Busan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 34, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu just outside Busan's area.
Sangju Sangmu's Han Seok-jong breaks free at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Dong Jun Lee awards Busan a goal kick.
In the minute 38, In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Busan drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Busan's half.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Romulo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Romulo for Busan is back on the field again.
The away team have replaced Kwon Hyeok-kyu with Kim Jung-hyun. This is the first substitution made today by Duk-Jae Cho.
Dong Jun Lee signals a throw-in for Sangju Sangmu, close to Busan's area.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 45, Busan are pushing forward but Lee Jung-hyub's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Dong Jun Lee has blown to start the second-half.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Sim Sang-min is replacing Ahn Tae-hyeon for the home team.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dong Jun Lee waits before resuming play because Kim Jin-hyeok for Sangju Sangmu is still down.
Kim Jin-hyeok is back on the pitch.
In the minute 48, Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
In Sangju, Kim Bo-seob of Sangju Sangmu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 50, Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Busan at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In Sangju Sangju Sangmu attack through Kim Bo-seob. The finish is off target, however.
Busan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 54, The home team replace Oh Se-Hun with Seon-min Moon.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Throw-in for Busan at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 57, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dostonbek Tursunov (Busan) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 59, Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Busan.
In the minute 62, Sangju Sangmu's Kang Sang-uh misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee awards Busan a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Park Guan-woo is on a sub for Kim Byong-oh for Busan.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 68, Sangju Sangmu's Seon-min Moon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Busan defender.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Busan.
Kim Moon-hwan is booked for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
In Sangju Busan drive forward through Romulo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Goal! Seon-min Moon gives Sangju Sangmu a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Kim Bo-seob.
In the minute 76, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Busan's half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Busan.
Free kick Busan.
Lee Jung-hyub (Busan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 81, Dong Jun Lee awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Busan to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Duk-Jae Cho is making the team's third substitution at Sangju Civic Stadium with Park Jun-kang replacing Kim Moon-hwan.
In the minute 83, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Busan.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu make their third substitution with Jeong Jae-Hee replacing Kang Sang-uh.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Busan are coming forward and Park Jun-kang gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Sangju.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Busan.
Lee Jung-hyub (Busan) strikes at Sangju Civic Stadium but his header is cleared.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Goal! Sangju Sangmu extend their lead to 2-0 through Seon-min Moon.
Great play from Kim Bo-seob to set up the goal.
